Interaction.Name: oj_intro_02
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Ye be eyein' me citrus?

Interaction.Name: oj_intro_03
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: The fruit be mine.

Interaction.Name: oj_choice
Interaction.Text: Can I have one of those oranges?

Interaction.Name: oj_orange_00
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: The fruit be mine.

Interaction.Name: oj_orange_01
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Please?

Interaction.Name: oj_orange_02
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Nay.

Interaction.Name: oj_orange_00
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Ye hallowed bearer of the pale stone.

Interaction.Name: oj_orange_11
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: I bequeath ye one of me fine fruits. Treasure it as ye treasure yer life!

Interaction.Name: oj_choice
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: I need to give you this poster.

Interaction.Name: give_poster_0
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: I-

Interaction.Name: give_poster_01
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Bring me a stone white and fine as snow, the type with which one may draw meaning.

Interaction.Name: give_poster_02
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: ...Excuse me?

Interaction.Name: give_poster_03
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Yer ears be failing ye? Bring me a stone white and fine as snow, the type with which one may draw meaning.

Interaction.Name: give_poster_04
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Look, I really don’t have time for-

Interaction.Name: give_poster_05
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Return when ye've found it.

Interaction.Name: give_poster_02
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: I won’t repeat myself again.

Interaction.Name: give_poster_0
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: I got you that chalk. Now please take this flyer off my hands.

Interaction.Name: give_poster_success
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Aye, great stone-bearer, I accept yer offering.

Interaction.Name: give_chalk
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: The stone! How did you know?!

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_10
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Um, did you want this chalk?

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_11
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Give it here!

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_12
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Alright then...

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_13
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Ye have done me a great kindness this day. I owe you a debt that can never be repaid.

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_14
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: I, uh, sure.

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_15
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: I have no idea what just happened but I’ll take it.

Interaction.Name: give_chalk
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: At last! The blessed marking stone!

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_20
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: It’s called ‘chalk’.

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_21
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: What did you need this for, anyhow?

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_22
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: That information be highly confidential. Ye need not trouble yerself over such trivial things.

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_23
Interaction.Speaker: OJ
Interaction.Text: Ye have done me a great kindness this day. I owe you a debt that can never be repaid.

Interaction.Name: give_chalk_24
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: You're welcome, I guess.

Interaction.Name: oj_choice
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie
Interaction.Text: Nevermind.
